bioconda.name: bifrost
bioconda.summary: Highly parallel construction and indexing of colored and compacted de Bruijn graphs.

biocontainers.name: bifrost
biocontainers.summary: Highly parallel construction and indexing of colored and compacted de Bruijn graphs

biotools.summary: Bifrost is a command-line tool for sequencing that features a broad range of functions, such as indexing, editing, and querying the graph, and includes a graph coloring method that maps each k-mer of the graph to the genomes it occurs in.

bioschemas.name: Bifrost
bioschemas.summary: Bifrost is a command-line tool for sequencing that features a broad range of functions, such as indexing, editing, and querying the graph, and includes a graph coloring method that maps each k-mer of the graph to the genomes it occurs in.
